act:
468147 THE INFLUX FROM PAKISTAN (CONTROL) REPEALING (REPEAL) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 33 OF 2001 [ 3rd September, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Influx from Pakistan (Control) Repealing Act, 1952.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
694963 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Influx from Pakistan (Control) Repealing (Repeal) Act, 2001.
553771 2Repeal of Act 76 of 1952.- The Influx from Pakistan (Control) Repealing Act, 1952 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
